tags: look there's a full team right there
summary: So I’ve been wondering what Pokemon Tim’s team would’ve consist of if he had gone on to become trainer like he wanted to when he...
body:
So I’ve been wondering what Pokemon Tim’s team would’ve consist of if he had gone on to become trainer like he wanted to when he was a kid and I think the movie more or less implied which ones?

At least the Pokemon who helped Tim specifically?

Ok, so maybe Cubone doesn’t fit that description but it was the first Pokemon Tim made contact with in the film.

Under different circumstances, I’m pretty sure Tim could’ve, rather easily, coaxed Cubone into joining him since he can understand the loss Cubone is going through. And the movie showed Tim can empathize with Pokemon as long as he lets himself.

(I also like the idea of this Cubone in particular coming back to Tim later on now that his family drama is mostly resolved but that’s exclusive to the movie, I guess)

Of course, definitely Pikachu.

Most importantly, Harry’s Pikachu since I support the theory that Harry always intended to give Pikachu to his son before their estrangement prevented that from happening, leading Pikachu to become Harry’s partner instead.

The random Lickitung from the train who tried to cheer Tim up (d’aww, what a sweetie~).

LE BABEY OF ALL BABEYS

<3333

Alternatively, Tim can, y’know, just let himself be adopted by that herd of Bulbasaurs. That’d be cool, too.

Maybe one of the Aipom?

I mean, they did give him back his pants once the effects of the R serum wore off, after all.

See? They good bois :)

And I dunno, maybe if this was like one of the core games, he’d catch Mewtwo, too.

Maybe.

I dunno.

blog.name: manyofnine
blog.title: Give me a Crown
blog.description: i want to rule the world

body:
Movie Night VIII

I just watched Detective Pikachu. Awww that movie was heartwarming!! So much Nostalgia. Never really played ornwatched Pokémon as a kid, but i grew up with a lot of friends that loved it. It’s surprising how many names i knew from the few times i watched an episode at a friends house, borrowed the old pokemon platin to play on my DS or got hugged by my bff when her pokemon evolved on Pokémon Go…

For me Pokémon is intrinsically intertwined with Friendship and playing together and childhood arguments on who is stronger.

This put me in a mindset i think i need atm, as i feel kind of isolated i have to admit. It’s out of my own choices and i know that my friends care about me. But it’s nice being reminded how everything is supposed to feel

summary: I want to be the very best, Like no one ever was. To catch them is my real test, To train them is my cause. I will travel across...
caption:
I want to be the very best,
Like no one ever was.
To catch them is my real test,
To train them is my cause.
I will travel across the land,
Searching far and wide.
Each Pokemon to understand
The power that’s inside
It’s you and me
I know it’s my destiny
Pokemon! 

If you like what I do please consider buying me a coffee to keep me awake (Or some pokemon cards)

tags: i want to thank you again for this kind message anon :)
summary: Your blog always makes me smile. You always have something nice to say about the fan art you reblog, which is really awesome,...
question: Your blog always makes me smile. You always have something nice to say about the fan art you reblog, which is really awesome, especially since fan artists don't always get the appreciation they deserve. So thank you for your sweet comments
answer:
First of all i’m very glad that my blog makes you smile. It really means a lot to me knowing that i could make your day a bit brighter. :D

I also agree with you that fan artists, most of the time, don’t get the recognition and appreciation they deserve. That’s why i set my goal to reblog all the fanart of Detective Pikachu and maybe soon other pokemon.

It really bothers me sometime to see such talented people work hard on these amazing artpieces and then upload them here for us to look at for free and they only get a couple likes back? Sometimes i see amazing artwork with only 5-10 notes and ask myself:”WHY?! This is amazing! Why is noone liking or reblogging this???”. So that’s why i want to try my best and help out all the people who take time out of their day to draw amazing fanart.

In the end… one like or reblog can make a difference. :)

A day later at the...

summary: It annoys me that on tumblr when Wreck it Ralph came out there was a metric fuck ton of art of the Turbo twins and shit and...
body:
It annoys me that on tumblr when Wreck it Ralph came out there was a metric fuck ton of art of the Turbo twins and shit and they’re only in the film for literally 1 second and yet they and Turbo got Onceler-ified and there were so many fanfics and art of them-

Yet meanwhile I am scraping the dregs of the internet to look for Ms Norman fan art, a character who is literally lesbian cat nip and tumblrs tough lady aesthetic, and I can count the fan arts I’ve seen on my hands.

What I’m saying is Tumblr plz give lesbeans and lady eye candy for once.
